interestingFact: Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, which is the largest rainforest in the world.
Germany is known for its famous beer purity law, which dates back to 1516.
India is the world's largest democracy.
The UK is made up of four countries: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.
The United States has the world's largest economy.
China is home to the Great Wall of China, the longest wall in the world.
France is famous for its wine production and is one of the largest wine producers in the world.
